nodes.bodyText: Pleas put this into Constants class.
Is there a reason for a SuppressWarnings
As seen in this link https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49464246/when-using-firebase-googlesignin-is-marked-as-internal-and-should-not-be-access it is a known issue in version 12.0.0
When renaming from GOOGLE PLUS to only GOOGLE, please refactor also this variables.
May split this up and make function calls on object
